name: Vapong 95
description:
Welcome to Vapong 95! Description

Get on your boat, enter the circle and fight the shark avoiding the shipwreck! Fight to conquer the waters of an eighties Miami... The last boat standing wins!

Special for a few beers with friends! Game features:
  • Incredible Vaporwave party game
  • Frenzy pong-style game mechanics
  • Choose from 4 amazing boats:
    Greek Boat
    Dolphin Boat
    Windows 95 Boat
    Miami Vice Boat
  • Local Multiplayer
  • 2 to 4 players
  • A killer shark to fight
  • Vaporwave original music (best music ever!)
  • Power ups and incredible special skills
  • An unique eighties environment
  • Infinite hours of fun!
Miami's fate is in your hands...
